en:
Our dialogue system supports BBCODE tags
here's a guide about tags: https://docs.godotengine.org/en/3.5/tutorials/ui/bbcode_in_richtextlabel.html?highlight=bbcode#reference

there's also custom tags:
[spd 0.5] - change text speed to 0.5 symbols/frame
[inst 5] - instantly display next 5 symbols
[snd sans] - choose sans soundbit
[wait 60] - delay for 60 frames
[event custom_event_data] - emits custom event with "custom_event_data". Never use this tag pls, it's only for programmers.

[color=gray][inst 13]!!!warning!!![/color]
[spd 0.9][snd sans]fast text with... [wait 60]sans soundbit
[spd 0.1][snd null]slow text without sound bite.
Director, Composer, Writer, Artist, Beta Tester

My sincerest thank you to everyone involved in the making of this project, and to you the player.
Until next time, farewell.

This is a non-profit fangame and all characters are property of Toby Fox. We; the Underfell Asgore team recommend that you play UNDERTALE first, as this game contains spoilers for the original game.

With that being said, we hope you enjoy!
[snd asgore][event face_asgore1]*I've been waiting for you.
[event asgore_stand_up][event face_asgore0][wait 150]*It must have been an awful journey...
*Especially with the monsters that lurk out there.
*Unfortunately, you will have to face one more.
*In truth, when I was told I would be facing someone so small...
*I didn't deserve it to be true.
*I can't allow this cruel trick of fate to stop me.
[event take_to_barrier]*My people and I have waited long enough.
(The distant, towering figure above you doesn't move at all as his lifeless eyes coldly stare you down.)
(You stare back, knowing it could very well be your first and last act of defiance.)
(As your journey draws to a close, you face one final challenge.)

[center]* You ate the Butterscotch Pie.
TODO MESSAGE ABOUT ASGORE'S ATK
[center]* Then, the time has finally come...
[event enemy_dial]What is it that you hope to accomplish?
[event enemy_dial]Many of your kind have died at my hand.
[event enemy_dial]Child or not, don't think I won't kill you as well.
[event enemy_dial]Heed this from me, young one.
[event enemy_dial]So naive, just like my daughter when she was younger.
[event enemy_dial]Did you encounter someone named Undyne on your journey?
[event enemy_dial]I raised and cared for her as if she were a blood relative.
[event enemy_dial]But as she grew older, I knew I would eventually have to tell her the truth.
[event enemy_dial]I wanted to find a way to take her with me.
[event enemy_dial]As painful as it was, I knew she had to be exiled.
[event enemy_dial]I couldn’t bare the theatrics of a trial.
[event enemy_dial]I wish things could have been different.
[event enemy_dial]But thanks to you, now they can be.
[event enemy_dial]Would you like to know why?
[event enemy_dial]The numerous determination experiments that my royal scientist conducted…
[event enemy_dial]Made me appreciate how powerful a human SOUL really was.
[event enemy_dial]Through the power of the determination...
[event enemy_dial]I will give us all a second chance.
[event enemy_dial]I was the one that ordered the experiments that destroyed countless families.
[event enemy_dial]I made the royal scientist loathe herself.
[event enemy_dial]All of it can be swept away like a bad dream.
[event enemy_dial]One final act of cruelty to save possibly millions.
This... isn't how it's supposed to end...
And to think I had it in me to destroy humanity...
I really have become pathetic, haven't I...?
Young one, the fighting is over...
[color=gray]* We're all so proud of you...
[color=gray]* But now, it's time for you to join us.
[color=gray]* Come on, before your tea gets cold.
[event face_asgore6]* I missed you all so much…
